Retrolahman Baseball Database

  • Introduction
  • Installation

Introduction

This is a project that combines both the Retrosheet game logs and player data with Sean Lahman’s Baseball Database for the years 1920 through 2012 with data provided as JSON documents.

The reason this exists is to allow querying of Retrosheet’s excellent historical along side Lahman’s excellent statistical data.

Data available (described as paths):

  • /players/{id}
  • /games/{team_id}/{year}/{game_number}
  • /teams/{year}/{team_id}
  • /seasons/{year}/{team_id}

Schemas for the JSON documents and some examples of querying can be found below.

For now data will be distributed as a Docker container with a CouchDB database.

Installation
  • Install Docker
    • Linux
    • OS X/Linux
    • Windows
  • Pull image: docker pull narf/retrolahman:latest
  • Start db: docker run -i -p 5984:5984 narf/retrolahman
  • Wait for the db to start. You’ll see Apache CouchDB has started. Time to relax when finished.
  • open http://localhost:5984/_utils/ in your browser. You should see a couch DB UI.
